title: ZipReg
author: ZipReg
created_time: August 02, 2022, 09:00:19 PMLast edit: August 07, 2022, 06:44:25 PM by ZipReg
content: Greetings Everyone! I hope you're all doing well As you may know, I presented this project to you all as a concept piecedesigned around the iconic Jan. 3rd 2009 THE TIMES front page layout.What I did not reveal, however, is that this release is actuallya loaded crypto puzzle disguised as a conceptual art piece!  The World's first LOADED Conceptual Art CanvasA hoard of loaded canvases with a design based on a sci-fi concept that alters the iconicJanuary 3rd, 2009 THE TIMES front page layout. Disguised as a conceptual art project, theLimited Edition pieces of The Times Traveler contain an intricate crypto puzzle which hasbeen carefully embedded into their design. Whomever is skilled enough to find the secretsand successfully unlocks the key, claims all of the BTC locked away in the canvases! Thewinner earns the BTC and bragging rights, and every contestant own's a 100+ yearfade resistant conceptual art canvas with a very unique history attached.In actuality, each Limited Edition piece is in fact a "one off" that has been printed from it's own unique source. You only need one Limited Edition piece to unlock the key ofThe Times Traveler, however, having a prototype or proof may help!The best part about our crypto puzzle contest is that you do not need to destroy any of the pieces to unlock the secrets of The Times Traveler, it is hidden in plain sight!  Guys... There's frickin' BTCitcoin embedded into these frickin' canvases!! CoolStorage.org Presents..."The Times Traveler" Limited Edition16x20 Gallery Wrapped LOADED Canvas Crypto Puzzle* picture does not do these justice, guaranteed much more impressive in person *Your winning bid is the entry fee to receive a #001-#009 Limited Edition Canvasand register as a contestant in The Times Traveler Crypto Puzzle Contest This contest is about having fun with a new concept, a first of it's kind!Well... now the fun really begins! The two prototype auctions have beencompleted and they are now in the hands of their respective owners.The prototypes do not contain the crypto puzzle.Consider them a reference that may help decode the Limited Edition pieces.  There are also two proofs that do not contain the crypto puzzle.Who will discover the secrets and unlock the key to The Times Traveler?  Only TIME will tell!  * Limited Edition Canvases #011-#021 ARE SOLD OUT *This AUCTION is forLimited Edition Canvases #001-#009and Limited Edition Proof #002.#001 -#002 - #005 -#006 -#007 -#008 -#009 -Proof -Each piece is numbered, signed, and comes with COA.Bid example: #1 @ 0.007BTC /or/ Proof @ 0.003BTCLE Canvas Starting bid: 0.007BTCLE Proof Starting bid: 0.003BTCBid Increments: 0.0002BTCEnd date and time:  Sunday, August 7th 2022 at 7pm EST. Countdown Timer*** SHIPPING INCLUDED!!  ****Up to $50. Any cost over that will be paid by the winner.Any Import/VAT taxes are to be paid by winner.Sniping: Any bid made within the last 5 minutes of the auctionwill extend the auction 5 minutes, any additional bid within thattime shall extend the auction an additional 5 minutes.Excluded from Bidding: I may exclude any bidder at my sole discretion.Payment: Will PM winners with payment details*NOTE* Winning only the proof does not enter you in the contest,only Limited Edition Canvas #000-#021 HODL'RS are registered contestants.Thank You & Good Luck Everyone!  I am proud to offer you all, what is by far my greatest creation in this space todate, and am greatly appreciative of all of the positive feedback and support!I'd also like to announce that as of Today, August 2nd, 2022,the Anniversary of the signing of the Declaration of Independence,I have completed the third and final loading of the TimesTraveler Canvases with their BTC Grand Prize!  'MERICA FUCK YEAH!!!! Once the pieces are distributed I will post aCLUE in the contest thread to kick things off!Official Contest Thread

comments.author: Iced
comments.body: Delighted to see this auction! 1. 0.007 BTC

comments.author: FFrankie
comments.body: # 5 0.007 btcWait did you blur the picture on purpose for the puzzle? Or is it all clear?

comments.author: ZipReg
comments.body: Quote from: FFrankie on August 04, 2022, 12:53:57 PM# 5 0.007 btcWait did you blur the picture on purpose for the puzzle? Or is it all clear? Hey buddy  Thank you, Sir! I wont go into too much detail about that yet! What I will say is that in person you will be impressed with the piece, and all of the puzzle secrets are very clear, although hidden in plain sight.

What I will say is that in person you will be impressed with the piece, and all of the puzzle secrets are very clear, although hidden in plain sight.  My Time travel day one , i saw some hidden stuff there .unfortunately , All of my art collection are hidden 2   waiting to move on so i can display all art

Sounds like you need more wall space, eh?    Thanks again for the kind words via PM, happy to hear you like it!
